) VALUES( NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, #{reg_id}, SYSDATE, #{reg_id}, SYSDATE, #{reg_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENTS, READ_CNT, CHG_DT, CHG_ID FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{notice_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, CHG_DT = SYSDATE, CHG_ID = #{reg_id} WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{notice_seq}
